foreignData.name: Saugende Wellhornschnecke
foreignData.text:
Aufblitzen
Fliegend
Wenn die Saugende Wellhornschnecke ins Spiel kommt, neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Lege X +1/+1-Marken auf die Saugende Wellhornschnecke, wobei X gleich den umgewandelten Manakosten des Zauberspruchs ist.

foreignData.name: Buccino desecador
foreignData.text:
Destello.
Vuela.
Cuando el Buccino desecador entre al campo de batalla, contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Pon X contadores +1/+1 sobre el Buccino desecador, donde X es el coste de maná convertido de ese hechizo.

foreignData.name: Bulot puiseur
foreignData.text:
Flash
Vol
Quand le Bulot puiseur arrive sur le champ de bataille, contrecarrez un sort ciblé. Mettez X marqueurs +1/+1 sur le Bulot puiseur, X étant le coût converti de mana de ce sort.

foreignData.name: Buccina Risucchiante
foreignData.text:
Lampo
Volare
Quando la Buccina Risucchiante entra nel campo di battaglia, neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Metti X segnalini +1/+1 sulla Buccina Risucchiante, dove X è il costo di mana convertito di quella magia.

foreignData.name: 吸収するウェルク
foreignData.text:
瞬速
飛行
吸収するウェルクが戦場に出たとき、呪文１つを対象とする。それを打ち消す。吸収するウェルクの上に＋１/＋１カウンターＸ個を置く。Ｘはその呪文の点数で見たマナ・コストに等しい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — イリュージョン

foreignData.name: Búzio Drenante
foreignData.text:
Lampejo
Voar
Quando Búzio Drenante entrar no campo de batalha, anule a mágica alvo. Coloque X marcadores +1/+1 em Búzio Drenante, sendo X o custo de mana convertido daquela mágica.

foreignData.name: Канализационный Прыщ
foreignData.text:
Миг
Полет
Когда Канализационный Прыщ выходит на поле битвы, отмените целевое заклинание. Положите X жетонов +1/+1 на Канализационного Прыща, где X — конвертированная мана-стоимость того заклинания.

foreignData.name: 吮咒蛾螺
foreignData.text:
闪现
飞行
当吮咒蛾螺进战场时，反击目标咒语。在吮咒蛾螺上放置X个+1/+1指示物，X为该咒语的总法术力费用。

foreignData.name: 吮咒蛾螺
foreignData.text:
閃現
飛行
當吮咒蛾螺進戰場時，反擊目標咒語。在吮咒蛾螺上放置X個+1/+1指示物，X為該咒語的總魔法力費用。

name: Draining Whelk
originalText:
Flash
Flying
When Draining Whelk enters the battlefield, counter target spell. Put X +1/+1 counters on Draining Whelk, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

rulings.text: If the target spell is an illegal target by the time Draining Whelk’s ability tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You don’t put any counters on Draining Whelk. If the target is legal but the spell can’t be countered, you do put counters on Draining Whelk.
Draining Whelk’s ability counters the target spell even if you can’t put counters on Draining Whelk, most likely because Draining Whelk left the battlefield before the ability resolved.
For spells with {X} in their mana costs, use the value chosen for X to determine the spell’s mana value.

text:
Flash
Flying
When Draining Whelk enters the battlefield, counter target spell. Put X +1/+1 counters on Draining Whelk, where X is that spell's mana value.
